channel.title: Dont read-problem solved
channel.description:
ok im goin to run 2 servers at once
Is There A Way To Make both The Servers Make The Characters To Save To The Same Place, so it will be like haveing 2 worlds..sort of like rs
so that if u get 99str on one server, when you chaneg the port and go to my other server u will have 99 str there as well...plz help me with this

item.title: Dont read-problem solved
item.dc:creator: @mrx229 mrx229
item.description:
@mrx229 wrote:

thx every1 for your help i think i figured out how to do it!

Read full topic

item.title: Dont read-problem solved
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

Change the path of where it reads levels from.

Read full topic

item.title: Dont read-problem solved
item.dc:creator: @Tyy_yyT Tyy/yyT
item.description:
@Tyy_yyT wrote:

You would need to change the written text of the character files. You would also have to change the written text of the other stored files. You can use.

"+playername+".txt

That links to where the files are written.

Read full topic

item.title: Dont read-problem solved
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

if you want that,you’ll have to keep transfering charactor files around each server
unless u make a connection between them.

Read full topic
